title: Completed PE Summary - Nora
raw_html:
Category Merchant
Registered Owner & Manager: Euro-Baltic Shipping Services
Flag: Estonia
Type: Dry Cargo
Built: 1977
Length overall: 86.52
Gross tonnage: 2351.00
Date 08/12/03
Location of incident: Hull harbour area
Incident Type: Accident to person
Injuries/ fatalities: 1 fatality
Damage/ Pollution: None

Synopsis

Fall overboard into dock causing death of an officer.

Action taken:

A letter was written to the Head of Marine Casualties Investigation of the country of origin of the deceased officer to inform him of the circumstances of the death.
